paramInformation.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF
paramInformation.description: Responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF from Main Controller

options.label: ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON active, ALL OFF active

paramInformation.label: Power reporting in watts on power change
paramInformation.description: Power consumption change threshold for sending updates

paramInformation.label: Power reporting in Watts by time interval
Slats tilting full turn time
paramInformation.description: Slat full turn time in tenths of a second.

options.label: Previous position for Z-wave control only
Return to previous position in all cases

paramInformation.label: Motor moving up/down time
paramInformation.description: Shutter motor moving time of complete opening or complete closing

paramInformation.label: Motor operation detection
paramInformation.description: Power threshold to be interpreted when motor reach the limit switch

paramInformation.label: Forced Shutter calibration
paramInformation.description: Enters calibration mode if set to 1

paramInformation.label: Reporting to Controller
paramInformation.description: Defines if reporting regarding power level, etc is reported to controller.

paramInformation.label: Power consumption max delay time
paramInformation.description: Time delay for detecting motor errors

paramInformation.label: Power consumption at limit switch delay time
paramInformation.description: Sets the time delay for detecting limit switches

paramInformation.label: Relay delay time
paramInformation.description: Defines the minimum time delay between next motor movement

paramInformation.label: Temperature sensor offset settings
paramInformation.description: Adds or removes an offset from the measured temperature.

paramInformation.label: Digital temperature sensor reporting
paramInformation.description: Threshold for sending temperature change reports
